title: Content Idea Generator: Get Unlimited Blog Ideas | Semrush

Features

Topic Research Tool

Content Idea Generator

Find out what resonates with your audience, design a winning content plan, and structure your articles with our easy-to-use Topic Research tool.

Try It For Free Today
Create a High-Performing Content Plan
With our blog ideas generator, you can easily create a competitive content plan entirely focused on your audience’s needs and interests.
Find the most popular and trending content ideas and questions people ask
Discover the most engaging headlines
Perform a content gap analysis
Discover the Most Popular Topic Ideas
Finding relevant content ideas for your audience can be a real challenge. Our Topic Research tool simplifies and automates the process to give you actionable insights.
Filter the most relevant topics based on their ranking difficulty
Discover location-specific ideas based on the most popular and relevant ideas in your region
Stay relevant with trending topics in your field from the last 60 days
Find searches related to your seed topic and get more ideas for creating content
Write a Blog Headline That Brings Results
Use our content ideas generator to see the most popular headlines related to your topic and analyze them to create your own.
Increase click through rate and engagement with the right blog title
See the most shared headlines based on the number of backlinks and social engagement
Discover popular headlines and add them to your favorite ideas to use for inspiration
Find the Most Asked Questions Related to Your Topic
Content that provides answers and insights will resonate with your audience. Our tool automates this process and structures your articles based on the most popular questions asked online.
Explore the who, what, where, when, why, and how related to your content
Structure your content in a customer-centric way, boosting your chances of ranking higher
Perform Content Gap Analysis
Find topics that your competitors rank for and create a plan that fills in the gaps.
See a list of content ideas already covered by your competitors
Fill in the gaps in your content plan based on what performs well for your competitors
See ideas in a mind map
Save your favorite topics and titles and export them to an .xls file.
Send tasks to Trello
Create an SEO template for a topic and get actionable SEO recommendations
“I absolutely love Semrush Topic Research. It helps me understand what is out there, what are popular searches and what are the most popular articles related to my topic.”
Hana Bednarova
Founder of Bednar Comms, Digital PR Specialist
Create Winning Copy with Our Blog Ideas Generator
Try It For Free Today
What’s Next

Combine creativity and analytics on each step of your workflow using the Semrush Content Marketing Platform.

Prepare a Brief

Create content that drives marketing results. Get a tailored template for optimized and search-friendly content

Learn more
Contact us
USA, 800 Boylston Street, Suite 2475, Boston, MA 02199
Get started with Semrush!
or see our plans & pricing
